verses.content: Pathien mithmu le, mi hring le mithi ngaituotu ding, Krista Isu mithmua chun, ân lârna le a ram sâlin, ṭhahnemngaitakin kân hriettir che:
Thu chu hril rawh, a huna khawm, a hun nawa dâm khawm thaw pei rawh; dawtheitaka inchûk- tir peiin an thiem nawna inhriettir la, infui la, kâwk rawh.
Inchûktirna indik an ngai pei naw hun a la tlung ding a ni sih a; an nahai ân za leiin anni dit zâwng angin inchûktirtuhai an kuomah inkhâwm lem an tih.
An na chu thutak tieng chun suksêt an ta, tienami thu tieng pêt tâng an tih.
Nang ruok chu iengkimah fim- khur la, rinum tuor la, Chanchin Ṭha hriltu tieng sin thaw la, i rawng- bâwlna kha hlen rawh.
Kei chu tu khawm hin inhlânin ka um zing ta sih a, ka suok pha a tlung tah.
Inruolsiekna ṭha chu ka thaw zo tah a, kân tlânsiekna lampui chu ka suo tah a, ringna chu ka vawng zing ta a nih.
Tuhin chu felna lallukhum chu ka ta dingin siein a um tah a, chu chu Lalpa, ngaituotu feltak chun chu nia chun mi pêng a tih; ka kuoma chau ni loin, a hung inlang nâwkna ngaituhai po kuoma khawm.
Inhmawtakin ka kuomah hung hrâm hrâm rawh.
Dema chun tulai khawvêl hi a ngainat leiin a mi mâksan tah a. Thessalonikaah a fe ta sih a; Kreske chu Galati ramah a fe tah a, Tita chu Dalmati ramah a fe ta bawk a, Luka chau ka kuomah a um tah.
Marka kha fiel la, hung ṭhuoi ve rawh; ama chu rawngbâwl tieng ka ta dingin a ṭangkai sih a.
Tukik chu Ephesiah ka tir tah a.
I hung pha leh Troasa Karpa kuoma zakuo fuol ka mâksan kha, lekhabuhai le khan hung chawi la, savun lekha mawl kha hung chawi rawh.
Alexander, dâr sung thiem kha ka chungah a suol bêk bêk hlak a nih;
Lalpa chun a thil thaw ang peiin thung a tih. A kuoma khan nang khawm fimkhurtakin um rawh, ei thu a kal nasa hle sih a.
Ka thiemna thu ka hril hmasak ṭum chun tûkhawmin an mi ṭhangpui nawh, an mi thlathlam ta vawng lem a nih; a maw chu phurin um tâwl naw raw hai se.

Chanchin Ṭha keima leia hril kima a um theina ding le, Jentailhai po poin an hriet theina dingin, Lalpa chun a mi ṭan a, a mi sukhrât ta lem a nih; chun sakeibaknei baua inthawk kha sansuokin ka lo um ta a nih.
Lalpa chun suolna po poa inthawkin mi sansuok a ta, a vân rama chun himtakin mîn tlung a tih; ama chu chatuona ropuiin um raw se. Amen.
Priska le Akuila, Onesiphora sûnghai le khan, chibai mi bûkpêk rawh.
Erasta chu Korintha chun a um zing tah a, Trophim ruok chu Miletiah damnawin ka mâksan tah.
Thlasik hmain hung hrâm hrâm rawh aw. Eubul hai, Puden hai, Lina hai, Klaudi hai, unau po pohai leh chibai an bûk che.
Lalpa chu i thlarau kuomah um raw se. Lunginsietna in kuomah um raw se.
